pageContext.claim: “Wouldn't it have been nice if we got Osama Bin Laden a lot sooner than that, wouldn't it have been nice? You know, living -- think of this -- living in Pakistan, beautifully in Pakistan in what I guess they considered a nice mansion, I don't know, I've seen nicer. But living in Pakistan right next to the military academy, everybody in Pakistan knew he was there.”
pageContext.analysis: The discovery that Osama bin Laden was living in Abbottabad was a shock to the Pakistani government and deeply embarrassing. There has never been evidence that any senior official was aware of his hideout. He did not live openly and carefully shielded his movements.
